item.title: How Modern is the MoMA? Purchases of Paintings by MoMA Over the Years
item.description: This post contains my visualization of the MoMA’s Purchasing Patterns by Year of Creation of the Painting. I was trying to determine what era of art the MoMa purchases from and if the year of creation followed the year of purchasing. Package Install ## here() starts at /Users/amywilliams/Desktop/datavis/amy_williams_blogdown ## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.2.5 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.5 ## ✔ tidyr 0.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com.
